tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: On November 16 I fell down while playing batminton .myself and Dr vijay chandar stays in same apartment. After I fell down we called dr vijay with in 10 minutes he came to see me to batminton court , and advised to  consult him in cura .then took x ray and I had fractured and ankle dislocate so  he suggested for surgery and I went through surgery .I am very very happy with his treatment .he is very soft spoken person ,very friendly with his patients and very good human being also ,and he helped me a lot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a fall in 2020 and had very badly fractured both my tibia and fibula. Doctor Vijay attended my case and gave a detailed prebriefing of the procedure and surgery. I had to get implant on both my tibia. The treatment and mental support shared by Vijay doctor and others at Cura Hospital was appreciable. All my concerns and queries were patiently explained. I thank Vijay Doctor and Cura for all the support and treatment with which now I am back to normal and able to walk and run after a 1.5year of recovery period. God bless you doctor and he give you the strength and health to help the needy...we love you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother met with an accident. We immediately took her to PM Santosha Multispecialty Hospital. Dr Vijay Chandran, an orthopedic surgeon, successfully diagnosed that it was a 3part fracture. He's an impeccable surgeon and performed the surgery successfully. He's friendly and has a lot of patience to explain each and everything about the diagnosis and treatment. He's empathetic towards his patients. My mother is aged, but she's recovering well because of perfect diagnosis and treatment. Thank you very much Dr Vijay Chandran.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ******* ** ** ********* ********** ******** My mother was suffering from constant hip pain since 2 years. We consulted Dr. Vijay in PM SANTOSHA HOSPITAL. He thoroughly examined my mother, went through the X-ray/MRI Reports and suggested hip replacement surgery. He thoroughly explained us the case and gave us the confidence to go in for the surgery. Now it is one and half months post surgery and my mother is recovering well. My heartfelt thanks to Dr. Vijay sir and the entire hospital team. I personally recommend 'PM SANTOSHA HOSPITAL' to everyone. Great Hospital, Excellent Doctors and Great Team with Great Attitude !

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: My brother had an accident the surgery has been done by Dr vijay chanda* ** ** *** ** *** ****** ** * *** **** ***** best thing about Dr is his nature he is soo friendly u never feel awkward for asking things nd bst part is he will elaborate things in such a way that u will able to get it. A part from that he is a very good surgeon. The surgery of my brother has been done successfully. And others doctors also appreciated his work he has done a great job. he have saved my brother legs. Thanku soo much sir we need more Dr like u for the betterment or the society n our country.once again thanku so much sirüòäüòáüôèüôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Went for knee arthritis for my grandmother.Although she was reluctant to undergo knee replacement.The way Dr.Vijay Chandar explained about the condition, his down to earth nature and good sense of humor made her so comfortable talking to him. She underwent knee replacement surgery on right knee.1st day of surgery she had some pain.next day she was made to walk.everyone were very happy to see her walk so comfortably without pain or limp. 
Was discharged after 5 days.1 month over now after surgery.my grand mother is so happy,walking comfortably.everyday she keeps talking about the doctor,so I decided to post this msg .
Thank you Dr.Vijay Chandar. You are one of very few doctors who genuinely has concern and care for the patient.Service to humanity is service to god.this we have seen in you.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is the most friendly doctor I have ever seen. Once you start talking to him you forget you are in the hospital. He gives enough time to listen to all our complaints. He wonderfully explains us the problems and also different treatment modalities available and the best option. I would definitely recommend him for any orthopedic problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To be honest, one of the cool and best in class surgeon, very direct, no masking of the issue. And makes the patient very comfortable pre, while-in and post surgery. Kind and empathetic to his patients. Perfect doctor qualities. saved my mother from 2 odd long years of hip pain due to dislocation of implant. Thank you isn't enough to tell him. _/\_

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself dr. Mamatha , my brother met with an accident 1mnth back, he had posterior hip dislocation and acetabular fracture. Dr. Vijay chandar sir operated on him. He very kind, patient  and friendly.. He explained me every details of the surgery and treatment clearly and answered my queries calmly.. Surgery was done perfectly, even my colleagues appreciated it. It is inspiring to see ******** *** kind doctor like him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I underwent a Syndesmosis Surgery. Dr. Vijay is the most caring and compassionate Dr who understands the patient's anxiety and apprehensions and deals in a calm and composed manner. He is never impatient and gives us ample time to cope during post surgery treatments as well. I would surely recommend his services to anyone who is in need of any Ortho Consultation. Thank you Dr Vijay Chandar. My best wishes!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My daughter had an accident and her sholder bone was fractured, the surgery was done by Dr Vijay Chander. A very friendly doctor,  explained everything in  detail and was ready to answer any of our queries.  The fracture was corrected perfectly using an implant. Can recommend Dr Vijay to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for a consultation to Dr. Vijay Chander as my maid got bone fracture on her left ankle. I must admit, the kind of treatment Dr. Vijay did was exceptional. The moment XRay report was on his desk, he called me and explained the entire scenario. He patiently did the treatment and my maid could walk properly after 4 weeks. I must say Dr. Vijay is too friendly and the medical skills and expertise he carries is impeccable. A big cheers to Dr. Vijay. keep serving the society.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited him after a critical road accident resulting in serious muscle and tissue loss from my left leg including fracture in the fingers of my leg.The condition was so critical that even my family and friends were worried, If I could ever be able to walk on my legs again. But thanks to Dr. Chandar that the surgery turned to be completely successful. He kept a close eyes after the surgery too for many days just to ensure that I was completely fine. Today I've recovered beyond measures. He had always been so polite with my family and friends and kept them informed about the proceedings in a simple and clear manner. Besides his expertise in surgery his friendly nature and gentle gesture is equally appreciable. The respect and gratitude that he has earned from me and other patients is beyond measures.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from back pain due to physically challenged, doctor Vijay really a good doctor and deeply understand our health conditions and provides a permanent solution. From one year I didn't get that problem again. ** ** *** **** ****** ** *** **** * **** *** ********** ********* Now again consulted him for my leg fingers infection swelling and suffering from more pain. He just did a fantastic treatment, more than that he motivate us, he explains to not feel our problem as big as we felt. Really I am great full to you sir. Now I can walk, I can sit and work as you promised. Keep doing this great job sir and help the patients like me to regain the life.

review:
To the administrative officer 
Respected sir, i entered your hospital with spinal cord radial pain, came out after surgery without pain, the treatment done at hospital is knew no bouns, treatment by nurse, ward boys is the main effect in the mind and body of the patient, which cures the pain od disease. The nursing staff treatment as well as ward boys treated me as a father /grandfather with affection, sir i wish to inform u some names of staff of ur hospital for there best and sincere service towards patient, please write a confidential reports in their service record.

2.MEGHANA (staff nurse )

review: Hospital,Facility and Doctors are really good ,I would recommend this hospital  some improvement is required for pharmacy and canteen if I need to give some feedback other wise all good

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Vijay is very clear in explaining the procedure. He is not like other Doctors who rush you to the OT. He tried convincing me into not going through surgery. But I insisted and went ahead as I wanted to get rid of my spinal pain. Dr regularly visited me on rounds and also post surgery, he was very caring and available for any doubts and concerns. He helped me a lot in pain management as well.  I would recommend him to all my family and friends. Thank you Dr Vijay.
